caption.title: Cumulative detected incidence at the end of year 22 across the range of detection sensitivities ( œÅ) tested in the dedicated simulation study.
caption.p: Each polygon represents one peach orchard. All eight simulations start at year 1 from a unique introduction patch with 25% initial prevalence and spread is determined by the long-range kernel. Note that the final detected prevalence varies non-monotonically with detection sensitivity because the removal of detected trees reduces disease spread.
Click here for additional data file.
